text: Click here for Assistant Professor Post Details IIT Bombay Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for SPM, PA, JRF & Other Posts: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Bombay has issued a notification for the recruitment of Senior Project Manager, Project Assistant, Senior Project Research Scientist & Other vacancies for various projects on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 27-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IIT Bombay Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 10 Name of the Post: 1. Senior Project Manager: 01 Post 2. Project Assistant: 01 Post 3. Senior Project Research Scientist: 01 Post 4. Assistant Project Manager: 01 Post 5. Senior Research Fellow: 01 Post 6. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post 7. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post 8. Research Associate: 01 Post 9. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post 10. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Ph.D with minimum 4 years relevant experience for Post 1, B.Com/ BBA/ BA/ B.Sc for Post 2, Ph.D in Chemical Engineering/ Biotechnology for Post 3, M.Sc in life sciences with minimum 2 years relevant work experience for Post 4 & for more details refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.ircc.iitb.ac.in on or before 27-02-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates have valid e mail id & contact number 2. Candidates log on the website www.ircc.iitb.ac.in 3. Click on Job opportunities & select the desired post 4. Read all the notification & Click on online link 5. Fill all the details & submit the form 6. Now take a print out of online application for future use Last Date to Apply Online: 27-02-2017. For more details like project, salary, job profile, qualification & other information click on the link given below… Click here to Apply Online – IIT Bombay Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for PRA, RA & SRF Posts : Industrial Research & Consultancy Center, Office of the Dean (R&D), Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Bombay has published notification for the recruitment of Project Research Assistant, Research Associate & Junior Research Fellow vacancies for the various projects on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 20-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process &how to apply are given below…. IIT Bombay Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 04 Name of the Post: 1. Project Research Assistant: 01 Post 2. Research Associate: 01 Post 3. RA: 01 Post 4. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post Educational Qualification : Candidates should posses BE/ BTech (Electrical Engg) or ME/ MTech/ MS in Electrical Engineering/ Power Electronics/ Drives would be considered for Post No. 01, Ph.D/ MD/ MS/ MDS or equivalent Degree for Post No. 02 and 03 & Post Graduation Degree in Atmospheric Sciences, Environmental Studies, Earth Sciences, Engineering (Civil, Chemical, Computer Science) with a First Class from a reputed institute for Post No. 04 with relevant experience. Selection Process : Shortlisted candidates will be called for interview. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.ircc.iitb.ac.in on or before 20-02-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates have valid e mail id & contact number 2. Candidates log on the website www.ircc.iitb.ac.in 3. Click on Job opportunities & select the desired post 4. Read all the notification & Click on online link 5. Fill all the details & submit the form 6. Now take a print out of online application for future use Last Date to Apply Online: 20-02-2017 For more details like project code, project title, salary, job profile & other information click on the link given below….
